description:
Give your feet a warm winter. A lightweight, waterproof, insulated hiking boot will do the trick. Easily compatible with snowshoes, the Hike Winter Boot's contoured midsole offers cushioned support for long hours on the snowshoe trails. A waterproof-breathable membrane keeps powder and slush on the outside where they belong, while synthetic hollow fibre insulation circulates heat to keep your toes cozy despite the uninviting temps outside. A super-grippy sole lets you hike confidently down snowy trails and slippery driveways.

  • Mid-height, breathable soft shell upper
  • B-Tek™ waterproof membrane keeps feet dry
  • Thermaplush™ soft, next-to-foot wicking layer for warmth
  • Form-fitting B-Tek™ Foam lining for comfort
  • EVA midsole for light-weight insulation and cushioning
  • Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) plate for torsional rigidity
  • Speed-lace front fastening system and pull loop at the back for ease of entry
  • Polar Rubber™ outsole for maximized grip and longevity of boot at cold temperatures
name: Baffin Hike Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
